name: Home (itch) (mengqigao)
description:
One day prototype. This is an unfinished piece, and I will keep working on it.

The game is about the stuggle between reality and ideality, between self-acceptance and self-denial. It features abstract symbolism. Every object in this game has deeper representational meaning.

The game is inspired by Zhunagzi, Enjoyment in Untroubled Ease, "You, Sir, have a large tree and are troubled because it is of no use - why do you not plant it in a tract where there is nothing else, or in a wide and barren wild? There you might saunter idly by its side, or in the enjoyment of untroubled ease sleep beneath it."

此作的灵感来源于庄子《逍遥游》，“今子有大树，患其无用，何不树之于无何有之乡、广莫之野，彷徨乎无为其侧，逍遥乎寝卧其下？”

当挣扎在现实与理想之间，否定与接纳之间，何处为家？以有待之身而寻无何有之乡、广莫之野，如何逍遥？
